```{r setup}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(ggplot2)
opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, echo = FALSE)
```

# Section 1
Here is a table

```{r}
kable(mtcars[1:5, 1:5], booktabs = T, caption = "a table") %>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = c("striped", "HOLD_position"), position = "left")
```

\clearpage

# Section 2
Here is a plot.

```{r}
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = mpg, y = wt)) +
  geom_point()
```
